p: According to the entomological surveillance as depicted in Additional file 5, mosquito density decreased gradually after September 27. BI averaged at 6.47 with max 16.33 before September 27, and averaged 1.90 with max 6.14 after September 27. SSI averaged at 6.71 with max 29.41 before September 27, and averaged 1.16 with max 8.99 after September 27. ADI averaged at 4.12 with max 15.00 before September 27, and averaged at 1.65 with max 7.35 after September 27.
